title: Sinful Treasure
description: Venice, Italy - early 1800sWhen vampire rake Lorenzo Conti finds a beautiful woman sleeping in the bedchamber of his newly aquired home, he believes her to be a housewarming gift bestowed upon him by his thoughtful friends. There's only one thing to do with such a delicious ravish her!The mysterious Bianca rushes to Venice upon her father's death but arrives too the house that she believes to contain a priceless treasure has already been sold. Hoping the new owner won't move in for another few days, she breaks in to search for her father's elusive treasure.But when Lorenzo discovers her, she has to think fast and find a way to remain at the house to continue her search. And what better way than to seduce the new owner?This is a novella of approx. 150 pages / 38,000 words.Each chapter is illustrated with a photo of Venice. explicit and graphic sex, incl. use of sex toys and other sexual taboos. This is an erotic novella.Scanguards Vampires Book 1: Samson's Lovely MortalBook 2: Amaury's HellionBook 3: Gabriel's MateBook 4: Yvette's HavenBook 5: coming at Christmas 2011Out of Olympus Book 1: A Touch of GreekBook 2: coming in Summer 2011Venice Vampyr Novella Venice Vampyr (#1)Venice Vampyr (#2): Final AffairVenice Vampyr (#3): Sinful TreasureStand alone Lawful Escorttinawritesromance.com
author: Tina Folsom
